Patent Information.Patent Title: ANTIMICROBIAL PEPTIDE DERIVATIVE HAVING ENHANCED ANTIMICROBIAL ACTIVITY, HEMOLYTIC STABILITY AND STABILITY IN BLOOD SERUM
Patent Information.Abstract: The present invention relates to an antimicrobial peptide derivative having enhanced antimicrobial activity, hemolytic stability and stability in blood serum. More specifically, the present invention relates to an antimicrobial peptide derivative, having enhanced antimicrobial activity, hemolytic stability and stability in blood serum, on the basis of Coprisin-induced CopW peptide (LLWIALRKK-NH₂).
